TextView.android:text: The goal of this game is to match all flag tiles with its corresponding country tile.
All tiles are closed initially. Flag tiles are the orange ones, and country tiles are the white ones.
If a flag tile is tapped, then subsequently a country name has to be tapped; and vice versa.
The goal is to open all 40 tiles is least possible time and moves.
This game provides hints, i.e by long-pressing the first tile of a pair, which will show information about the tile pressed.
But using a hint will be counted as a move, which eventually will worsen the end result
